PW Lapse in Reg Cert Cleared

fieldUpdates.description: Update approval time when reg status set to 'Approved', this is for auto renewal identification
fieldUpdates.name: REG Update Approval Date Time

fieldUpdates.description: Update payment time when reg payment status set to 'PAID', this is for auto renewal identification
fieldUpdates.name: REG Update Payment Date Time

fieldUpdates.description: Resets send application to false so it can be resent as needed.
fieldUpdates.name: Reset Send Application

fieldUpdates.description: Resets Send_License_Registration_Permit_Boolean__c to false so it can be resent as needed.
fieldUpdates.name: Reset Send License Registration Permit

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND(Month(TODAY())=2,Day(TODAY())=29), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) + 1, Month(TODAY()),Day(TODAY())-1), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) + 1, Month(TODAY()),Day(TODAY())) )
fieldUpdates.name: Set Expiration date to one year
Set expiration date to three months

outboundMessages.description: Conga Workflow: to attach Affidavit PDF
outboundMessages.name: REG: PW Send Affidavit

outboundMessages.description: Conga Workflow: to attach Registration PDF for new and renewals.
outboundMessages.name: REG: Registration Send Application

outboundMessages.description: Sends FLC Permit through verification screen
outboundMessages.name: REG: FLC Permit

outboundMessages.description: Sends the registration, license, or permit pdf to the applicant. Triggered from CommunityRegistration.vfp when the users clicks email PDF.
outboundMessages.name: REG: Send License Registration Permit

outboundMessages.description: Sends the application pdf to the applicant
outboundMessages.name: REG: send application

outboundMessages.description: Attachs Registration PDF for new and renewals. WFR "REG: Send Application"
outboundMessages.name: Registration Attach Reg at Submit Nintex

outboundMessages.description: Sends FLC Permit through verification screen WFR "Registration FLC Send Verification"
outboundMessages.name: Registration FLC Permit Nintex

outboundMessages.description: Sends PW Affidavit via Dashboard WFR "REG: Send PW Affidavit"
outboundMessages.name: Registration PW Send Affidavit Nintex

outboundMessages.description: Send on submission WFR "REG: Send PW Registration"
outboundMessages.name: Registration PW Send Registration Nintex

outboundMessages.description: Sends the application pdf to the applicant via dashboard WFR "Send Application"
outboundMessages.name: Registration Send App Dashboard Nintex

outboundMessages.description: Sends Permit once re-approved, Effective dates changed WFR 1 "REG: Send new license once re-approved" WFR 2 "REG: Send new license when effective date changes"
outboundMessages.name: Registration Send Perm ReApproved Nintex

outboundMessages.description: Sends Permit once approved WFR 1 "REG: Send new license once approved" WFR 2 "REG: Send temporary license once approved"
outboundMessages.name: Registration Send Permit Approved Nintex

outboundMessages.description: Sends Permit from Dashboard WFR "Send License Registration Permit PDF"
outboundMessages.name: Registration Send Permit Auto Nintex

rules.fullName: 15 day renewal notice for different license type
rules.formula: Recalculate__c || ( (Expiration_Date__c - TODAY() <= 15) && (Expiration_Date__c >= Today()) && ISBLANK( Registration_Renewal_Rollup__c ) && !ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Temporary') && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved') && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Entertainment_Work' && !ISPICKVAL( Registration_Duration__c , '10 Days - Temporary Permit') && !ISPICKVAL( Imported_From__c , 'LR-EWP') && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Permit_to_Employ_Minors' && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Public_Works' )

rules.fullName: 30 day renewal notice for different license type
rules.formula: Recalculate__c || ( (Expiration_Date__c - TODAY() <= 30) && (Expiration_Date__c >= Today()) && ISBLANK( Registration_Renewal_Rollup__c ) && !ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Temporary') && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved') && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Entertainment_Work' && !ISPICKVAL( Registration_Duration__c , '10 Days - Temporary Permit') && !ISPICKVAL( Imported_From__c , 'LR-EWP') && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Permit_to_Employ_Minors' && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Public_Works' )

rules.description: Emails Registration Applicant 45 days prior to workers' comp insurance cert expiration date.
rules.formula: IF( WCI_Expiration_Date__c - TODAY()= 45, TRUE, FALSE)

rules.fullName: 60 day renewal notice for different license type
rules.formula: Recalculate__c || ( (Expiration_Date__c - TODAY() <= 60) && (Expiration_Date__c >= Today()) && ISBLANK( Registration_Renewal_Rollup__c ) && !ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Temporary') && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved') && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Entertainment_Work' && !ISPICKVAL( Registration_Duration__c , '10 Days - Temporary Permit') && !ISPICKVAL( Imported_From__c , 'LR-EWP') && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Public_Works')

rules.fullName: 90 day renewal notice for different license type
rules.formula: Recalculate__c || ( (Expiration_Date__c - TODAY() <= 90) && (Expiration_Date__c >= Today()) && ISBLANK( Registration_Renewal_Rollup__c ) && !ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Temporary') && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved') && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Entertainment_Work' && !ISPICKVAL( Registration_Duration__c , '10 Days - Temporary Permit') && !ISPICKVAL( Imported_From__c , 'LR-EWP') && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Permit_to_Employ_Minors' && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Public_Works' )

AND(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE (Function_as_Employee_Leasing_Co__c), 'No'), ISCHANGED(Function_as_Employee_Leasing_Co__c), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Workers_Comp_Selection__c))),NOT(ISNULL(TEXT( Workers_Comp_Selection__c )) ))

rules.fullName: REG - Change Owner to Car Wash Registration Queue

rules.description: Capture Approval DateTime and compare with Renewal DateTime to determine if it's a autorenewal.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Approved') )
AND( ISCHANGED( Status_of_Payment__c), Status_of_Payment__c = 'Paid / No Balance Due' )

rules.description: Reminds applicant that payment is still pending 24 hrs after registration submission.
Workflow to reset renewal and trigger registration document on renewals.
Workflow to reset Registration_Send_Application__c and trigger registration document on new and renewal registrations.
rules.formula: Registration_Send_Application__c

rules.fullName: REG%3A Send FLC Approval Email once approved
rules.formula: !ISPICKVAL( Registration_Duration__c , '6 Months - Permit') && !ISNEW() && ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , 'Approved') && Approved__c == False && ISCHANGED ( Status__c ) && !ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Temporary') && !ISBLANK ( Effective_Date__c ) && !ISBLANK ( Expiration_Date__c ) && !ISBLANK ( Account_Email__c ) && (RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Permit_to_Employ_Minors') && (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Farm_Labor_Contractor')
Send_PW_Affidavit__c

rules.description: Workflow to reset checkbox used for PW affidavit/registration document
rules.formula: Send_PW_Registration__c

rules.fullName: REG%3A Send new license once approved
rules.formula: !ISPICKVAL( Registration_Duration__c , '6 Months - Permit') && !ISNEW() && ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , 'Approved') && Approved__c == False && ISCHANGED ( Status__c ) && !ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Temporary') && !ISBLANK ( Effective_Date__c ) && !ISBLANK ( Expiration_Date__c ) && !ISBLANK ( Account_Email__c ) && (RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Permit_to_Employ_Minors') && (RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Farm_Labor_Contractor')

rules.fullName: REG%3A Send new license once re-approved
rules.formula: AND(!ISPICKVAL( Registration_Duration__c , '6 Months - Permit'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Approved"), NOT(ISBLANK(Date_First_Approved__c)), (RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Permit_to_Employ_Minors'),(RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Farm_Labor_Contractor'),NOW() > Date_First_Approved__c + 0.1, Re_approved__c = FALSE, NOT(ISNEW()) )

rules.fullName: REG%3A Send new license when effective date changes
rules.formula: AND(!ISPICKVAL( Registration_Duration__c , '6 Months - Permit'),(RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Farm_Labor_Contractor'),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved'),Expiration_Date_WF_Fired__c = TRUE, !ISNEW(), OR( AND( !ISNEW() ,ISCHANGED(Effective_Date__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Effective_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Effective_Date__c))) ), AND( ISCHANGED(Expiration_Date__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Expiration_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Expiration_Date__c))))))

rules.fullName: REG%3A Send temporary license once approved
rules.formula: !ISNEW() && ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , 'Approved' ) && ISCHANGED ( Status__c ) && Approved__c == False && ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Temporary' ) && !ISBLANK ( Expiration_Date__c ) && !ISBLANK ( Effective_Date__c ) && !ISBLANK ( Account_Email__c)

rules.fullName: REG%3A Set temporary license effective dates
rules.description: Sets effective and expiration dates if date fields are blank.
Triggered by Search Email Verification process Send FLC Verification Boolean to trugger this Workflow - Used in RegistrationVerificationController
rules.formula: Send_FLC_Verification_Boolean__c

rules.description: Sends renewal notices at specified intervals based on the expiration of the registration.
rules.formula: Recalculate__c || ( Expiration_Date__c >= Today() && ( ( !ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Temporary') && ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , 'Approved' ) ) || ( !ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Temporary' ) && ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Approved' ) && Expiration_Date__c - Today() < 90 ) ) )

rules.description: Sets the Send Application field and triggers the application document to be sent to the applicant
rules.formula: Send_Application__c

rules.description: Triggered from Pending Final Submission flag if False Triggers - Send FLC Submission Renewal Email workflow rule will send Submission email to applicant.
rules.formula: Pending_Final_Submission__c = 'False' && RecordType.DeveloperName = "Farm_Labor_Contractor" && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, 'Paper')) &&(ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,'Resubmitted') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Submitted'))

rules.description: Triggered from CommunityRegistration.vfp when the users clicks email PDF. Sets Boolean Send_License_Registration_Permit_Boolean__c to true. Triggers Send License Registration Permit PDF workflow rule to be sent to the applicant.
rules.formula: Send_License_Registration_Permit_Boolean__c

rules.description: Triggered from Pending Final Submission flag if False Triggers - Send Transmit License Registration Email workflow rule will send Transmit email to applicant.
rules.formula: Pending_Final_Submission__c = 'False' && ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,'Transmitted') && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, 'Paper'))

rules.fullName: Set Expiration date to one year
Set Expiration date to three months
